title: [SOLVED]820-2936-B backlight theatre lights
message:
Water damaged board a tiny bit in the lvds area, replaced everything i saw that looked damaged. Now I get a picture and backlight. But the backlight is like theatre lights. It looks like they aren't all coming on only every other lights is, if that makes any sense.

I remember louis saying something about this in a video just can't remember what it was. LVDS connector already replaced.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-B backlight theatre lights
message: Check all return led resistors from R9717 to R9722 and traces, also check your soldering job on the connector....

title: [SOLVED]820-2936-B backlight theatre lights
message: everything measured fine. replaced lp8550 again and its now working fine
